title: Director/Sr. Director - Ad Sales - East Coast
content:
Remote - USA Based - East Coast - New York Preferred
Applicants must live in EST Time Zone
About Brave
Brave is on a mission to protect the human right to privacy online. We’ve built a free web browser that blocks creepy ads and trackers by default, a private search engine with a truly independent index, a browser-native crypto wallet, and a private ad network (opt-in!) that directly rewards you for your attention. And we’re just getting started. Already 50 million people have switched to Brave for a faster, more private web. Millions more switch every month.
The internet is a sea of ads, hackers, and echo chambers. Big Tech makes huge profits off our data, and tells us what’s true and what’s not. Brave is fighting back. Join us!Summary
Brave is looking for an experienced Ad Sales representative to join our remote sales team (based out of the USA).   This is a role focused on finding and developing new client relationships to place ads in our Ads Rewards Ecosystem.     
In this role, you will fast-track Brave’s revenue and growth by adding to our base of clients and increasing our Ad revenue across your territory.
Responsibilities

Identify, qualify and quantify advertising clients to grow Brave revenue.
Player coach - Managing a team of Directors and AE's across verticals and geo's
Develop business cases and create innovative proposals for potential customers that drive value for both parties
Foster relationships, and lead discussions and negotiations with partners from C-level execs to key functional leads.  Utilize VP and C Level relationships to help create Brand Partnerships.
Own, maintain, and develop a pipeline of potential advertiser leads in priority verticals
Work cross-functionally with product, design, marketing, and engineering as we develop and onboard partners
Influence key discussions about overall partnership strategy and platform roadmap
Work closely with the Brave’s executive team in supporting strategic partnerships

Requirements:

Demonstrated experience selling a wide variety of digital media ad products including Search, Performance Media, and Brand Advertising
Strong network of Sr Level Ad Agency and Brand Marketers spanning Fortune 500 / Fortune 1000 clients
Exceptional presentation skills
7-10 years of Digital Media Sales & Management
Has built and maintained a 5-10 million dollar book of business in past roles.  
Demonstrated success in selling Search related campaigns
Ability to structure and operate complex business deals
Highly organized in managing all aspects of client service
Experienced in executive-level presentations, both internally and externally
10+ years of business experience, but more preferred
Advanced 4-year degree in Technology or Business. MS or MBA is a plus

Working at Brave

Industry-leader in privacy, with a research and engineering team that’s innovating everyday to keep people safer online and beat Big Tech
Highly competitive salaries & benefits, and generous home-office stipends
Fully remote team (no office, no commute)
Welcoming, humble, ridiculously smart teammates, and a truly flat org structure
Opportunity to get in early at a hyper-growth company, and revolutionize the web
Oh, and did we mention Brendan, our CEO & co-founder, invented JavaScript?

 
United States Candidates: The base salary range for this role is $150,000.00 - $200,000.00 USD, depending on experience. The OTE for this role is $300,000-$400,000.
